definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: As always, presidential unilateralism puts Congress in a tough position.
sentences.chinese: 總統的單方面決定總是置國會與難堪的境地。

sentences.english: Ban also said it was time for Israel to consider a unilateral ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 潘基文也說現在是時候讓以色列考慮單方面的停戰。

sentences.english: Should it be interactive or should it be one-way?
sentences.chinese: 它是互動的還是單方面？

sentences.english: Pending settlement of the dispute over water, none of the parties may unilaterally alter the existing water regime.
sentences.chinese: 在水事糾紛解決前，當事人不得單方面改變現狀。

sentences.english: A one-way friendship will not last too long.
sentences.chinese: 單方面的友誼，是不會持久的。

sentences.english: Autocratic leaders tend to make unilateral decisions, dictate work methods.
sentences.chinese: 專制型領導者傾向於單方面做出決策，支配工作方法。

sentences.english: In some cases, decaying food is the least of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 但是有些時候，單方面的食物腐壞可能還只是小問題。

sentences.english: Investors were given a one-way bet.
sentences.chinese: 投資者陷身與一場單方面的賭約中。

sentences.english: The Japanese government expresses its regret that China is unilaterally developing the field, " Chief Cabinet Secretary Takeo Kawamura told reporters.
sentences.chinese: 日本政府對中國單方面對其開採表示遺憾。

sentences.english: At which time Masonite unilaterally terminated the agreement and ordered Dobson to discontinue his operations.
sentences.chinese: 在本協議終止時間之中單方面並命令他停止運作。

sentences.english: China has surplus funds and power to take unilateral decision but what s about India?
sentences.chinese: 中國的資金過剩，有實力單方面做出決定，印度呢？

sentences.english: The PKK has stepped up attacks after ending its unilateral cease-fire last month.
sentences.chinese: 庫爾德工人黨已加強其單方面停火結束上個月的攻擊。

sentences.english: Geneen disliked relying on one perspective as the means for giving him the whole picture.
sentences.chinese: 吉寧不喜歡依靠單方面的看法作爲了解全局的手段。

sentences.english: The Guardian report could not be independently verified.
sentences.chinese: 衛報的報道未能得到單方面確證。

sentences.english: Within a month, Kosovo is expected to unilaterally declare its independence from Serbia.
sentences.chinese: 在一個月內，科索沃將單方面宣佈脫離塞爾維亞獨立。

sentences.english: A case is described of diabolic hiccup due to a unilateral lesion of nucleus tractus solitarius in the brainstem.
sentences.chinese: 案件描述的毒辣呃逆由於單方面病變的孤束核在腦幹。
